context: Hi What movies do you want me to recommend?
Deadpool 2 (2018) very good movie I recommend it Recommend me a movie
Well movies like that I recommend The Avengers (2012) and X-Men: Apocalypse (2016) Are very very good movies!
and heard about that movie I'll keep it in mind What other could you recommend me?
resp: If you like those movies then do not miss seeing Black Panther (2018) I know you like them
